com.fluidops.iwb.ui
Class WidgetReconfigureForm

java.lang.Object
  com.fluidops.ajax.components.FComponent
      com.fluidops.ajax.components.FContainer
          com.fluidops.ajax.components.FForm
              com.fluidops.iwb.ui.WidgetReconfigureForm
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.fluidops.ajax.FEventListener
public class WidgetReconfigureForm
extends com.fluidops.ajax.components.FForm

The widget configuration form which is used to change the settings of an already configured and rendered widget. Takes initial values from the widget config object. On submission, replaces the widget on the page with a reconfigured one.

Author:
andriy.nikolov
